about_the_game:
Track Listing:

01 - Interstellar Rift, 02:38
02 - Ship Making, 04:16
03 - Galaxy Dawn, 02:55
04 - Interloper, 02:32
05 - Ship Breaking, 02:06
06 - Horizon Wake, 04:24
07 - Sky Harvest, 03:50
08 - Twilight Discord, 02:42
09 - Languid Constellations, 02:45
10 - Hurles Co., 02:43
11 - Galactic Trade Federation, 02:46
12 - Sentinel Security Systems, 04:08
13 - Drifters, 03:18

All music provided by The Otherworld Agency
Music composed by CURTIS SCHWEITZER
Music direction by Fabian Malabello

Music in MP3 and WAV formats.
After download the files can be found in the Interstellar Rift Steam Folder, usually "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Interstellar Rift\OST"
